nodes.text: Urrett's Marque was a bar located on Level 1329 of the Coruscant Underworld, and it was one of the roughest establishments of one of the roughest levels on Coruscant. At some point during the time of the Galactic Empire, Han Solo and Chewbacca hung around the bar while the Millennium Falcon was docked on the planet for a week, hoping to pick up some jobs before they left. Alinka Aloo and her team of bodyguards approached the smugglers at the bar and, after asking a few questions, gave Solo a card with her address and directed them to come to her home that evening, under the pretence of offering them a job. Urrett's Marque served fried nerf nuggets and after the encounter with Aloo, Chewbacca ordered some, fearing if the job went sour, he might not get another good meal for some time.

Urrett's Marque first appeared in the junior novel The Mighty Chewbacca in the Forest of Fear!, which was written by Tom Angleberger and published in 2018. It was named after audiobook narrator and friend of the author Mark Turetsky, who has narrated many books by Angleberger, including the Origami Yoda series.
